data.text: @_lilchen Thanks for coming on board with us! :)
@nammers Good to hear it was resolved! Looking forward to have you on board!
@frankus0512 Thanks for coming on board with us! Hope you enjoyed your flight!
Turn back time to the 90s and party with #DJdoc, Jo Sung-mo and Kim Hyun-jung! Party away the stress this summer! http://t.co/UTYOEjIBaw
@nammers Hello Courtney. Sorry for the inconvenience. How may we assist you?
@theamzgjetjones Awesome! Can't wait to have you on board!
RT @SportsFeatures: #Olympics Features: Gwangju Universiade announces Asiana Airlines as official sponsor, releases competition schedule ht…
Good morning! Happy Monday! We will be at GBTA convention this week at the LA Convention Center! Stop by our booth! http://t.co/I4WA2qzuxh
Smile! Hope you have a wonderful weekend! Thanks for this creative photo wahyupratomo! http://t.co/9csguZRMTQ
Our #ASIANA380 Sweepstakes has ended as of July 16th. We'll be announcing winners on our website early August!
The second #ASIANA380 has been delivered to us on Friday, July 25th! #A380 #Airbus #AsianaAirlines http://t.co/SfDqhBOUUg
@JuliaLizGrace Aww, thanks! :) Good to hear you enjoyed your flight. Hope to see you on board again soon!

Saekdongi says, "Hello!"

 #SaekdongiAdventures  #ASIANA380 http://t.co/DlquUIRHmm
Traveling from New York? Here's another look at our First Suites on the B777, JFK-ICN routes: http://t.co/bz9iUKOBcg (cc: @ShrinkTheGlobe)
Only 1 more week left to purchase special fares from the US to select destinations in Asia! Click for more info; http://t.co/jwFh4qAH0J
Welcome to the 2nd floor of the #ASIANA380, where the mood-lit bar & lounge await your visit! #a380 http://t.co/rmvBdbI3TS
Flying Business or First? Come join us upstairs! http://t.co/XT1lSjKGgL (cc: @AirlineLoop) #A380 #ASIANA380
We've been placed #5 International Airline on @TravlandLeisure's 2014 World's Best Awards! http://t.co/JufSlLdwvz http://t.co/TFVPsDUJ6b
RT @Carfield76: The @AsianaAirlines A380 Business class lounge http://t.co/wBeIt1Ygss
@citymuseum It's a big deal if the #gochujang is missing! #Bibimbap wouldn't taste the same. Hopefully its owner will pick it up soon. ;)
@thechrislowden Awesome! Can't wait to have you on board!
Happy Monday! We're now just a little over a month away from the new #ASIANA380 launch on the LAX-ICN route! http://t.co/BZjCSg5SMk
RT @cruiseshipcrew: The @AsianaAirlines steak on JFK-ICN was probably the best I've had on a flight. http://t.co/cATfz7dAfo
@Carfield76 gorgeous photo! Thank you!
We were featured on tonight's episode of Keeping Up with the Kardashians! Did you catch it? #KUWTK
Our billboard sure looks good against the beautiful blue sky on this Friday evening in Los Angeles!… http://t.co/2Q7Vpa5Jld
Welcome back home, parishilton! Glad to have had you on board our First Class! http://t.co/ZIG5XeM19h
Cheers! Hope you have a great weekend! http://t.co/KXSOn3WXWX (Thanks for the photo, @sddubzzz)
That seat looks quite familiar! ;) Bon voyage! RT @ParisHilton: Bye LA! Taking off to Korea!  http://t.co/G9PDQ8XdLz
@42nandoah Thanks for the kind compliments! ;)

Name this statue! 
#SEOUL #traveltuesday #asianaairlines http://t.co/9U5rQ1At9i
Gyeongbokgung Palace will resume nighttime visits from July 30th to August 11th! Visit #Seoul, Korea… http://t.co/p9Th4dJG3A
@cruiseshipcrew Hope you had a wonderful flight in our First Suite! :) Thanks for coming on board!
@NeerSoFly Welcome aboard and happy birthday in advance! :) Have a wonderful flight!
@elkinspaul21 Looking forrward to have you on board! :) Hope you have a wonderful trip to Korea!
RT @staralliance: Join us to welcome Air India as new member from July 11. Adding 400 daily flights, 35 new destinations to the network htt…
Has the summer heat defeated you? Cool off at the Dadaepo Sunset Fountain of Dream in Busan! #Korea #Travel #fountain http://t.co/Yu4zjxTNyd
RT @Flyasiana: #OZFLT Due to Typhoon 'Neoguri', today's flights from/to Kumamoto(OZ142/141) & Sizuoka(OZ126/125) are canceled.→ http://t.co…
@planearm Awesome photo! Thanks!
RT @AirlineLoop: #AsianaAirlines' new #A380-841 #FirstSuiteClass seats 1-E,F with 83" pitch, 32" HDTV, only 12 suites in the cabin http://t…
[#ASIANA380 Sweepstakes] Only 8 days until the end of the event! Click if you haven't entered: http://t.co/oXY2LWGdKH http://t.co/XarKjntN2E
[K-CULTURE Tour Event] Enter now for a chance to win airfare for 2, hotel & tour package! http://t.co/J8ZO0VWyCf http://t.co/3aZIgRil0E
ATTN: Golfers in the Korean community in SoCal! Join us & Korea Daily for a golf tournament on July 31st! More info: http://t.co/k166ljWYZc
@KyuminShim1 Hello! Please visit the link to enter into our sweepstakes: http://t.co/oXY2LWGdKH Good luck!
RT @phodan7: Take off^^ @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/fqAN91YxwW
RT @Flyasiana: 'It ain't over till it's over.' Let's go Korea~!!! #KOR vs #BEL http://t.co/uo8JG9hgBm @theKFA #다시한번대한민국
Happy 1st Day of Summer! Grab a friend & some pat-bingsoo and enjoy the sun! #summer http://t.co/lqvBAMCxba
Visit our Facebook page for a chance to win movie tickets to "No Tears for the Dead" ("우는 남자") http://t.co/NdvR3hIEE2 http://t.co/u5NCzNhaqn
Happy Friday! #TGIF Where will you travel this weekend? #ASIANA380 #A380 #Travel http://t.co/ZJKl73fOLw
Thanks for the love! :) "RT @lovatooooo: 激アツ I'm in love you @AsianaAirlines http://t.co/O3bsWizW8H"
@ktoongz Congrats & welcome aboard! Hope you enjoy your trip. :)
@NinkiCZ Anyone could use a little Sasha Fierce on board! :) Great choice in music for in-flight, Christopher!
@ssgunn Apologies for the schedule change, but glad you'll be able to make use of your time! Be sure to check out Transit Tours in ICN!
@ladykaeru So much to do on board! Thanks for flying with us!
Are you ready for Russia vs South Korea? Let's go #KOR! #WorldCup2014 http://t.co/WF7I2zkx45
Do you know which US gateways offer #BusinessSmartium seats on OZ? #AsianaAirlines #TravelTuesday
In #BusinessSmartium cabins, you won't ever have to jump over your neighbor to get to the aisles. #StaggeredLayout http://t.co/zrjuLYstu7
@Stuart58143471 @Flyasiana @ukflyasiana Welcome aboard!
Watch the #ASIANA380's first landing & take-off at NRT on June 13th: http://t.co/fFvo72Rnws #TravelTuesday #airbus #A380
@HithaPalepu Wow, thanks for the wonderful review of our lounge! It was a delight to read! Thank you. :)
Take a peek into the new #ASIANA380, taken by @flight_report! Exclusive #TripReport on the inaugural #A380 flight: http://t.co/jZu12BgEvk
Thanks! We'd love to have you on board again, too! RT @NinkiCZ: Had an excellent flight with @AsianaAirlines, so many wins, would fly again.
@wsyoon Hope you enjoyed your flight with us! Thanks for coming on board.
RT @wsyoon: #Asiana #OZ222 #ICN-JFK #FC (Kimchi Guksoo @ OZ222 ICN-JFK FC) http://t.co/V0Trs9qQGO
@RitchWorld Thanks for coming on board with us! Hope to see you again soon!
@orasmu Thank you! :)
@Alientjia Hope you had a great night on board our aircraft! :)
Happy Father's Day to the real heroes in our lives! We hope you receive all the love and happiness from the ones you work so hard for!
ASIANA380, coming right in! RT : #A380 #asiana #NRT http://t.co/BAta8lZQji
Up close! RT @Pika_JET747: Congratulations @AsianaAirlines on your first A380 commercial flight today! http://t.co/cmGfnmIBRg
This perspective is mesmerizing. Thanks! RT @AeroNewsWorld: The first @AsianaAirlines A380 commercial flight from NRT http://t.co/91M2lHb8XQ

June 13, 2014, #ICN International Airport: #ASIANA380's first commercial flight! 
#Airbus #a380… http://t.co/gjYu975S6T
Lovely picture of our 1st #ASIANA380 upon arrival at NRT by @firstnarrative: http://t.co/JVLmIkDTiV Thank you for the photo! :)
Thank you! :) RT @Airbus: Congratulations @AsianaAirlines on your first A380 commercial flight today! http://t.co/I6ejdsk142
@bta7 That's a nice photo of ICN! Hope you enjoyed your flight to Frankfurt!
If you enjoy the videos we've been posting up, enter in our sweepstakes for your chance to fly the #ASIANA380! Click: http://t.co/oXY2LWGdKH
Twinkle twinkle little star... See how the First Suite cabins in the #ASIANA380 sparkle in the dark: http://t.co/7SHXMasl3Z
Watch our new #ASIANA380 TV Ad (Premium Seats) and let us know what you're looking forward to! http://t.co/a6hq0E7RAF http://t.co/S57YbknlLx
@kyrn5824 Hello! Please refer to this page for more info: http://t.co/xeJwH8N7Qs
Thanks to @ThangNgo for making us hungry with this photo: http://t.co/wS4vT9LuLq!
@lavernld Hello, you may contact our Reservation Specialists at (800)227-4262 for inquiries. Thank you!
@Jetway320 Thank you! Hope to see you on board soon. Have a great week!
@planewatching You should take OZ235 then! :)
Good morning, Tweeps! Where do you dream of flying on this #TravelTuesday? Watch our #ASIANA380 take its 1st flight: http://t.co/LQj9BujxNk
@sadseas_ Hello, unfortunately, we do not yet offer wi-fi on our flights. Thank you.
@laeddhi ... You may contact our reservation center for further info: (800) 227-4262.
@laeddhi Hello, there may not be any more seats available at the early bird price you are looking for.
@ThangNgo Glad you enjoyed your flight with us! Hope to see you again soon!
@NdasentC Hello!
@Roaming1 Hi Dean! Thanks for the support! Hope to see you on board soon. Have a great weekend!
@VicSpotter31 This is beautiful! Thanks for sharing. Have a great weekend!
@SpeedBirdHD @VietnamAirlines @Airbus @airwaysmagazine @airchive Great photo! Thanks for sharing. :)
@millyyvonne @ruthaprilmay Hope you enjoy the movie! :)
TGIF, Tweeps!! What are you travel plans for the weekend?
@mbeltranva Thank you! :)
Wanna know how the #ASIANA380 is painted and beautified so gloriously? Watch here: http://t.co/TXAvCtizuu
Cozy up under the starlight & enjoy a movie (or 2, or 3) in the First Suite on the #ASIANA380! http://t.co/uALYQAXbc6 http://t.co/gUTtWFYw5i
@airlinetrends Hello, please refer to the following link to contact the proper department: http://t.co/zSKXwmeEPg
@iTobi_YT Thanks! :)
@Miguechan79 Hello! Thanks for the shout-out!
